quote: Working closely with Nicholas was like having a true partner in product. Together we elevated design across our company and the startups we guided, and built processes that united product, design and engineering.
author: Luca Bousquet

quote: Nicholas helped us resolve years of design and technical debt in our video app. Thanks to his redesign, development speed increased by 40% and content creation time dropped by half.
author: Julien Comte

quote: Nicholas brought clarity to our roadmap and aligned product with vision. His structured design process improved collaboration across teams and helped us cut release cycles by 25%.
author: Lucile Voisin

quote: Collaborating closely with Nicholas turned a rough idea into a working product. In just three months, we launched the first version of our editing app, cutting delivery time by 30%.
author: Matthieu Gindre

quote: Nicholas challenged our UX with a critical eye. He shaped interfaces that balanced creative direction with technical feasibility, cutting rework by 25% and speeding up launch.
author: Maxence Henric

quote: Nicholas delivered a semantic and scalable front-end system that lifted performance scores above 95. His production-ready components accelerated delivery and made releases smoother.
author: Guillaume Colombel
